name: Luxury L-Shape Sofa
shortDescription: Premium emerald velvet sectional with deep seating and button tufting
description: Luxurious sectional sofa upholstered in premium emerald velvet. Features deep seating with high-density foam and traditional button tufting. Perfect for spacious living rooms.

name: Blush Pink Loveseat
shortDescription: Sophisticated loveseat in soft blush pink upholstery
description: Sophisticated loveseat in soft blush pink upholstery. Features curved arms and plush seating for intimate spaces.
material: Linen Blend Upholstery, Ash Wood Frame

name: Striped Accent Chairs
shortDescription: Elegant pair of chairs with handwoven striped upholstery
description: Elegant pair of accent chairs with hand-woven striped upholstery. Perfect for creating conversation areas with traditional charm.

name: Designer Accent Chair
shortDescription: Modern accent chair with premium upholstery
description: A beautifully designed accent chair perfect for adding a touch of elegance to any room. Features premium cushioning and solid wood frame.

name: Heritage Platform Bed
shortDescription: Handcrafted platform bed with traditional joinery
description: Handcrafted platform bed with traditional joinery and contemporary lines. Features solid teak construction with brass hardware details.

name: Royal Canopy Bed
shortDescription: Majestic canopy bed with intricate carvings
description: A majestic canopy bed featuring intricate hand carvings inspired by Mughal architecture. Made from premium sheesham wood with gold leaf accents.

name: Heritage Dining Table Set
shortDescription: Hand-carved table with brass inlay and matching chairs
description: Exquisite dining set featuring hand-carved table with brass inlay work and matching chairs. Seats 6-8 people comfortably.

name: Marble Top Dining Table
shortDescription: Elegant marble top with carved wooden base
description: Stunning dining table featuring Italian marble top with intricately carved wooden base. Perfect for modern luxury dining spaces.

name: Classic Double Door Wardrobe
shortDescription: Spacious wardrobe with mirror doors and carved details
description: Spacious double-door wardrobe featuring beveled mirror doors, hand-carved crown molding, and ample storage with adjustable shelving.

name: Modern Sliding Wardrobe
shortDescription: Contemporary design with smooth sliding doors
description: Modern wardrobe with smooth-gliding sliding doors, integrated LED lighting, and customizable interior organization system.

name: Executive Writing Desk
shortDescription: Elegant desk with leather inlay and brass accents
description: Distinguished executive desk featuring leather inlay writing surface, multiple drawers with brass hardware, and cable management system.

name: Heritage Bookcase Cabinet
shortDescription: Tall bookcase with glass doors and carved details
description: Stately bookcase cabinet with glass-paneled doors, adjustable shelving, and intricately carved crown and base. Perfect for home libraries.
